post: Anoxie in response to colinsberry: “Ok. Here we are ! Your point was: Adler’s works is highly questionnable.” And here I thought Rogers was the one with dubious scientific credentials or work ethic. If person A tells me person B is bad, I may hold judgment until I know person B at a deeper level. But if person A continues on and tells me that person C is also bad and so on, I don’t have to go far in reaching a conclusion on whom I have to set a leery eye on and who is probably having a social skill problem..
